text: is a former professional baseball player from Japan.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/league.cgi?id=6d21c771 He played for the Fukuoka Daiei Hawks, the Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks, and the Orix Buffaloes of the Japan Pacific League.https://www.baseball-reference.com/register/league.cgi?id=6d21c771 ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball people from Ōita Prefecture Category:Aoyama Gakuin University alumni Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball outfielders Category:Fukuoka Daiei Hawks players Category:Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks players Category:Orix Buffaloes players Category:Asian Games medalists in baseball Category:Baseball players at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2002 Asian Games
title: Hisao Arakane
